## Repository Pilot Overview

### Repository Information

**Repository**: [Full repository name/URL]
**Primary Maintainer**: [GitHub username]
**Team Size**: [Number of active developers]
**Technology Stack**: [e.g., TypeScript, React, Node.js]
**Pilot Start Date**: [YYYY-MM-DD]
**Expected Duration**: 14 days

### Pre-Pilot Assessment

#### Risk Profile

**Overall Risk Level**: [Low/Medium/High]
**Risk Factors**:

- [ ] Active development (frequent commits)
- [ ] Production deployment frequency: [daily/weekly/monthly]
- [ ] Existing CI/CD pipeline complexity: [simple/moderate/complex]
- [ ] Team experience with automation: [high/medium/low]

#### Baseline Metrics (from collect-baseline.ps1/sh)

- **ESLint Warnings**: [X]
- **ESLint Errors**: [X]
- **TypeScript Errors**: [X]
- **High CVEs**: [X]
- **Files with Issues**: [X]

### Planned Improvements

**Primary Target**: [What ODAVL will focus on - e.g., unused imports, formatting consistency]
**Expected Benefit**: [Quantified goal - e.g., reduce ESLint warnings by 50%]
**Safety Constraints**: Standard governance (≤10 files, ≤40 lines per operation)

### KPIs & Success Metrics

#### Technical Metrics

- [ ] **ESLint Warning Reduction**: Target ≥[X]% improvement
- [ ] **Zero Regressions**: No new TypeScript errors or build failures
- [ ] **Security Maintained**: No increase in high-risk vulnerabilities
- [ ] **Build Stability**: 100% success rate for all builds

#### Process Metrics

- [ ] **Developer Satisfaction**: Target ≥7/10 rating
- [ ] **Review Overhead**: Target ≤30 min per ODAVL PR
- [ ] **Time Savings**: Target ≥[X] hours saved per week
- [ ] **Deployment Confidence**: No production rollbacks due to ODAVL changes

### Daily Progress Tracking

#### Week 1: Foundation & Supervised Mode

- [ ] **Day 1**: Environment setup ✅/❌ [Notes]
- [ ] **Day 2**: First baseline collection ✅/❌ [Notes]  
- [ ] **Day 3**: First supervised ODAVL run ✅/❌ [Notes]
- [ ] **Day 4**: First PR merged ✅/❌ [Notes]
- [ ] **Day 5**: Team training complete ✅/❌ [Notes]
- [ ] **Day 6**: Scaling to full constraints ✅/❌ [Notes]
- [ ] **Day 7**: Week 1 assessment ✅/❌ [Notes]

#### Week 2: Autonomous Mode & Scaling

- [ ] **Day 8**: Full autonomous activation ✅/❌ [Notes]
- [ ] **Day 9**: CI/CD integration ✅/❌ [Notes]
- [ ] **Day 10**: Multi-branch operations ✅/❌ [Notes]
- [ ] **Day 11**: Evidence collection ✅/❌ [Notes]
- [ ] **Day 12**: Team feedback collection ✅/❌ [Notes]
- [ ] **Day 13**: Success story generation ✅/❌ [Notes]
- [ ] **Day 14**: Final assessment ✅/❌ [Notes]
